creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Wellington Lee
description: figure with a hat and an ox walking through a field near LRC; tall, dark, curving land formations; trees at center L; Li River, Peoples Republic of China
markings: \'[crossed-out number]\'WORK EARLY\'/[crossed out] VALLEY OF MOUNTAINS/#A-11\', in black and blue ink, on back; \'ORIGINAL WORK BY/WELLINGTON LEE/HON PSA, FPSA, HON FRPS, HON EFIAP, HON FPSNY,/NEW YORK CITY, U.S.A.\', stamped, on back; \'\'VALLEY OF MOUNTAINS\', \'#20\' and \'3000-\', in pencil, on back; \'WELLINGTON LEE/HON PSA, FPSA [illegible], HON FPSNY/60 [illegible] AVE./FOREST HILLS, NY, 11375 USA\', stamped, on back; \'Wellington Lee\', in black ink, on back
title: Work Early
